newsitem.title: FRANCE: France's Europe 1 sees improved results in 1996/97.
newsitem.headline: France's Europe 1 sees improved results in 1996/97.

text.p: French media company Europe 1 said it expected profits in its 1996/7 financial year to be better than in the 12 months to September 30, 1996.
It denied in a statement earlier this week that it had told analysts at a meeting on Monday it expected profits to stagnate until the end of the decade.

"European 1 Communication denies having announced 'a stagnation of its profits from now until the year 2000'," it said. "The provisional information, given during the course of a meeting with analysts today, only concerned the current year. It looks to be...better than that ended September 30, 1996."
Europe 1 shares dropped on Monday after a report which said it had told analysts it expected its profits to stagnate at 70-80 million francs till the end of the decade.
